value.description: Currently active panel (if in accordion mode, the binding value type needs to be 'string', otherwise 'array')
value.description_zh: 当前激活的面板(如果是手风琴模式，绑定值类型需要为`string`，否则为`array`)

:v-model.description: Currently active panel (if in accordion mode, the binding value type needs to be 'string', otherwise 'array')
:v-model.description_zh: 当前激活的面板(如果是手风琴模式，绑定值类型需要为`string`，否则为`array`)

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when the current active panel changes ('activeNames' parameter is 'string' if accordion mode, 'array' otherwise)
events.description_zh: 当前激活面板改变时触发(如果是手风琴模式，参数 `activeNames` 类型为`string`，否则为`array`)
